publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2084 Rhona Brankin: The Fishing Vessels (Decommissioning) (Scotland) Scheme 2001—That the Rural Development Committee recommends that the Fishing Vessels (Decommissioning) (Scotland) Scheme 2001 be approved. Supported by: Ross Finnie*
